tgt_original: 大王！ 何者為內地界？

src_original: yat kiñcid asmin kāye adhyā- tmaṁ pratyātmam upagatam upāttaṁ tatropagataṁ tvaṅmāṁsādi- samudayam upāttaṁ keśadantanakharomasamudayaṁ khakkha- ṭaṁ kharagatam upagatam upādattam tat punaḥ katamam? yaduta: (6)

“ keśaromā nakhadantā rajas tvaṅmāṁsāsthi sirā snāyur hṛda- yaṁ plīhā klomakaṁ vṛkkā yakṛt kheṭa āmāśayapakvāśayā antrāṇy antraguṇā udaram udīrayakaṁ mastakaluṅgaṁ ceti |  “ yad vānyad apy asmin kāye adhyātmaṁ pratyātmaṁ khakkhaṭaṁ kharagatam upagatam upādattam;
tgt_original: 彼彼身內所有得有取、堅者強者，所謂髮、毛、爪、齒、塵垢、皮、肉、筋、骨、髓、脾、腎、肝、肚、大腸、小腸、大便、脬膜、腦胲。 大王！

src_original: (2.4.3) tatra kataro bahirdhaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ?  yat kiñcid bahi- rdhaṁ kakkhaṭatvaṁ kharagatam anupagatam anupādattam;
tgt_original: 大王！ 何者是身外地界？
